action.description: The committee(s) on  WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 12 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Aquino, Hashimoto, Kanuha, Lee, C., Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Moriwaki, DeCoite, Elefante, Inouye, Kim, Fevella ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Kidani; and 0 Excused: none.
